scripts.lint:count: find . -type f -name "*.js" -not -path "*/node_modules/*" -not -path "*/dist/*" | wc -l | xargs -I{} echo "🔢 Found {} JavaScript files to lint"
scripts.lint: pnpm lint:count && echo "🔍 Checking files..." && eslint . --format=stylish && echo "✅ All files pass linting!" || (echo "❌ Linting errors found! Run 'pnpm lint:fix' to fix them automatically." && exit 1)
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm lint:count && echo "🔧 Fixing linting issues..." && eslint . --fix --format=stylish && echo "✅ Linting issues fixed!"
